name: Jellyx
storyline: An amazing adventures is waiting for you! Match-3 double candy blocks and play new unique, an adventure filled fun logic game! Jellyx is a colourful fresh match-3 puzzler game. Delve into the world of magic and miracles together with your fancy characters Mr. Block & Dr. Alice Gems and help them solve puzzles, crush candies and pop bubbles! Match same colored jellies to complete your quest!
summary: Fun and unique simple gameplay based on a domino-like double blocks and match-3-like gameplay.
